title: Reading between the lines: inside the stories
creator_credit: Image Link and Video Education Australasia
brief_description: Looks at the content of our newspapers, through interviews with journalists and editors. It addresses the use of language, background, an article’s purpose, sources of information and the intended audience. No other credits available.
